events_categories.title: Networking Events
events_categories.description: Allows you to networking with other people within the industry.

events_categories.title: Workshop Events
events_categories.description: Find the workshop that suits you best.

events_categories.title: Music Events
events_categories.description: Lots of people from different parts of the country come to attend the show and enjoy the music

events_categories.title: Sport Events
events_categories.description: Share a passion and love for different sporting activities.

all_events.title: DJ music concert
all_events.description: Electronic music events during sunset at spectacular locations around the world.

all_events.title: Open-air health
all_events.description: The activities include Tai Chi, Pilates and Yoga, gymnastics, health sports, tango dancing, senior dancing, holistic fitness training, back exercise for all ages, physical and mental fit through exercise, variety of movement activities and so much more.

all_events.title: Free your art
all_events.description: As a painter, art classes are where you learn about brushes, paints, mediums, strokes, how to prepare your surface, how to paint, how to take care of your tools. A workshop, on the other hand, is where you learn a particular artist's methods.

all_events.title: UX - Creativity and teamwork
all_events.description: A collaborative group session which focuses on a specific goal or outcome. It's not just a meeting between UX designers and stakeholders; it's an active, interactive session, carefully designed to empower progress through teamwork.

all_events.title: Making items from wood
all_events.description: We offer woodworking workshops, guided practice, team building and expert consultation for all levels and abilities.

all_events.title: Networking for extroverts
all_events.description: You probably need no help with networking in general. But focusing your energy correctly - that is something where most people can improve.
